attributes.action: Make Cadbury's reinstate liqourice as the flavour for black Midget Gems.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For many years Lions traditional hard Midget Gems contained black liqourice sweets. Since being taken over by Cadburys they have been replaced with blackcurrant ones.
This is a serious issue, they are as sacred as Cumberland Sausage, Newcastle Brown Ale etc. and large companies shouldn't make these changes without hearing our opinion.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
